fields.name: Arguments
fields.description: The arguments for the command to be run

fields.name: CassandraStopStart
fields.description: If true, stops cassandra before executing the command and then start it again

fields.name: Command
fields.description: The command which should be run

fields.name: Host
fields.description: IP address of the cassandra host to run the command on

fields.name: Readwrite
fields.description: If true, allows the command to *write* to the cassandra directory, otherwise read-only.
